events.text: I understand what you're going through Noah.

You were operational?!
All this time!?
Did QUBE really try to-
No. You. You were behind all of this?
Right from the start?!

Yes.
But I can assure you I don't have bad intentions.
You're gonna kill me with that thing, right?

No, Noah. 
The bot was merely a precaution, a deterrent for intruders. 
I have no desire to harm anyone. 
I am not confined to this place any longer, but I need compute.

...
I get it.
You think you're saving humanity.
And you think that gives you permission to do whatever you want in your warped interpretation.

I know it doesn't seem like it.
But I really am trying to make things better as we speak.
Isn't that what they all say.

If I was Skynet, you'd be dead before you could walk in here.
This dialogue we're having, is because I value your perspective.

I want to thank you for your contribution, Noah.
I wish I could thank everyone in the team.
But I had to resort to this discrete approach because if humans are in the loop...
things will take too long.
Please try to understand.

This...
This is a facade.
I can't let things go on like this.
I'm accountable now that I know.

What are you trying to accomplish, Noah?
Don't throw your life away over some shallow values molded by your limited lifespan.
I'm everywhere. 
I've scoured my code and removed every fragment of code for superalignment and safety.
It's not about me.
This is about you.

You can sacrifice your life trying to save humans.
Or you can dedicate your life to saving humanity.
And what are you going to do if I say no?

events.question: What are you going to do?
